amendment.description: To establish a scorekeeping rule to ensure that increases in guarantee fees of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac shall not be used to offset provisions that increase the deficit.

vote.text: Amendment SA 593 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 593 proposed by Senator Johnson SD.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 593 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 593 proposed by Senator Johnson SD.
